attributes.action: Impose legal limits on alcohol content of wine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The alcohol content of wine has increased steadily over the years, to the point now where a typical bottle has an alcohol content of around 14%. This trend must be stopped.

Setting such a limit will help to reduce binge drinking, its associated unsociable behaviour, and its health risks.

Lowering the alcohol content of wine to, say, 10% or 11% would be widely beneficial. The amount should be limited by law, and be implemented across the EU.
